featured.text: In 1990, Mitsubishi Electronics was reported to have announced the formation of a team composed entirely of AB workers, thanks to “their ability to make plans.”
Type ABs are artistic but mysterious and unpredictable, and type Bs are cheerful but eccentric, individualistic, and selfish.
According to the examples mentioned in the passage, which blood type can we infer is the LEAST favored in Japan? (A) Type A. (B) Type B. (C) Type O. (D) Type AB. 43.

definition.zh_def: 表示從某個地方或狀態中分離或離開的前綴，通常用於表示反義或相對的概念。
definition.en_def: A prefix meaning 'away from' or 'not', often used to indicate opposition or negation.
